ActivateRouterInterface.title: ActivateRouterInterface
ActivateRouterInterface.summary: Activates a router interface that is in the Inactive state.

ActiveFlowLog.title: ActiveFlowLog
ActiveFlowLog.summary: Enables a flow log. After the flow log is enabled, traffic information about a resource is captured.

AddBgpNetwork.title: AddBgpNetwork
AddBgpNetwork.summary: Advertises a Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) network.

AddCommonBandwidthPackageIp.title: AddCommonBandwidthPackageIp
AddCommonBandwidthPackageIp.summary: Associates an elastic IP address (EIP) with an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

AddCommonBandwidthPackageIps.title: AddCommonBandwidthPackageIps
AddCommonBandwidthPackageIps.summary: Associates multiple elastic IP addresses (EIPs) with an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

AddGlobalAccelerationInstanceIp.title: AddGlobalAccelerationInstanceIp
AddGlobalAccelerationInstanceIp.summary: Associates an elastic IP address (EIP) with a shared-bandwidth Global Accelerator (GA) instance.

AddIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry.title: AddIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry
AddIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry.summary: Adds an IP entry to an access control list (ACL).

AddPublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlock.title: AddPublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlock
AddPublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlock.summary: Adds a CIDR block to an IP address pool.

AddSourcesToTrafficMirrorSession.title: AddSourcesToTrafficMirrorSession
AddSourcesToTrafficMirrorSession.summary: Adds a traffic mirror source to a traffic mirror session.

AllocateEipAddress.title: AllocateEipAddress
AllocateEipAddress.summary: Applies for an elastic IP address (EIP).

AllocateEipSegmentAddress.title: AllocateEipSegmentAddress
AllocateEipSegmentAddress.summary: Applies for contiguous elastic IP addresses (EIPs).

AllocateIpv6InternetBandwidth.title: AllocateIpv6InternetBandwidth
AllocateIpv6InternetBandwidth.summary: Default IPv6 gateways support only private communication. You can call the AllocateIpv6InternetBandwidth operation to purchase Internet bandwidth resources for an IPv6 address. This way, ECS instances in a VPC can access the Internet through the IPv6 address. IPv6 clients can also access the ECS instances over the Internet.

ApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA.title: ApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA
ApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA.summary: Applies for a Letter of Authorization (LOA) for an Express Connect circuit.

AssociateEipAddress.title: AssociateEipAddress
AssociateEipAddress.summary: Associates an elastic IP address (EIP) with a cloud resource that is deployed in the same region.

AssociateEipAddressBatch.title: AssociateEipAddressBatch
AssociateEipAddressBatch.summary: Associates elastic IP addresses (EIPs) with an instance in the same region.

AssociateHaVip.title: AssociateHaVip
AssociateHaVip.summary: Associates a high-availability virtual IP address (HAVIP) with an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or an elastic network interface (ENI).

AssociateNetworkAcl.title: AssociateNetworkAcl
AssociateNetworkAcl.summary: Associates a network access control list (ACL) with a vSwitch.

AssociatePhysicalConnectionToVirtualBord.title: AssociatePhysicalConnectionToVirtualBorderRouter
AssociatePhysicalConnectionToVirtualBord.summary: Associates a virtual border router (VBR) with a specified Express Connect circuit.

AssociateRouteTable.title: AssociateRouteTable
AssociateRouteTable.summary: Associates a custom route table with a vSwitch in the same VPC.

AssociateRouteTableWithGateway.title: AssociateRouteTableWithGateway
AssociateRouteTableWithGateway.summary: Associates a gateway route table with an IPv4 gateway in the same virtual private cloud (VPC).

AssociateRouteTablesWithVpcGatewayEndpoi.title: AssociateRouteTablesWithVpcGatewayEndpoint
AssociateRouteTablesWithVpcGatewayEndpoi.summary: Associates a route table with a gateway endpoint.

AssociateVpcCidrBlock.title: AssociateVpcCidrBlock
AssociateVpcCidrBlock.summary: Adds a secondary CIDR block to a virtual private cloud (VPC).

AssociateVpnGatewayWithCertificate.title: AssociateVpnGatewayWithCertificate
AssociateVpnGatewayWithCertificate.summary: Associates a VPN gateway with a certificate.

AttachDhcpOptionsSetToVpc.title: AttachDhcpOptionsSetToVpc
AttachDhcpOptionsSetToVpc.summary: Associates a DHCP options set with a virtual private cloud (VPC).

AttachVbrToVpconn.title: AttachVbrToVpconn
AttachVbrToVpconn.summary: Associates a virtual border router (VBR) with a hosted connection.

CancelCommonBandwidthPackageIpBandwidth.title: CancelCommonBandwidthPackageIpBandwidth
CancelCommonBandwidthPackageIpBandwidth.summary: Removes the maximum bandwidth configured for an elastic IP address (EIP) that is associated with an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

CancelPhysicalConnection.title: CancelPhysicalConnection
CancelPhysicalConnection.summary: Cancels an Express Connect circuit before it is enabled. After you perform this operation, the Express Connect circuit enters the Canceled state.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Moves an Express Connect circuit to a new resource group.

CheckCanAllocateVpcPrivateIpAddress.title: CheckCanAllocateVpcPrivateIpAddress
CheckCanAllocateVpcPrivateIpAddress.summary: Checks whether a private IP address in a specified vSwitch is available.

CheckVpnBgpEnabled.title: CheckVpnBgpEnabled
CheckVpnBgpEnabled.summary: Checks whether the region of an IPsec-VPN connection supports BGP.

CompletePhysicalConnectionLOA.title: CompletePhysicalConnectionLOA
CompletePhysicalConnectionLOA.summary: Generates a report for an installed Express Connect circuit.

ConfirmPhysicalConnection.title: ConfirmPhysicalConnection
ConfirmPhysicalConnection.summary: Changes the status of an Express Connect circuit to Confirmed.

ConnectRouterInterface.title: ConnectRouterInterface
ConnectRouterInterface.summary: Initiates a connection from the router interface of an initiator to the router interface of an accepter.

ConvertBandwidthPackage.title: ConvertBandwidthPackage
ConvertBandwidthPackage.summary: Converts a NAT service plan to an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

CopyNetworkAclEntries.title: CopyNetworkAclEntries
CopyNetworkAclEntries.summary: Copies rules of a network access control list (ACL).

CreateBgpGroup.title: CreateBgpGroup
CreateBgpGroup.summary: Creates a BGP group for a virtual border router (VBR).

CreateBgpPeer.title: CreateBgpPeer
CreateBgpPeer.summary: Adds a Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) peer to a BGP group.

CreateCommonBandwidthPackage.title: CreateCommonBandwidthPackage
CreateCommonBandwidthPackage.summary: Creates an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

CreateDefaultVpc.title: CreateDefaultVpc
CreateDefaultVpc.summary: Creates a default virtual private cloud (VPC).

CreateExpressCloudConnection.title: CreateExpressCloudConnection
CreateExpressCloudConnection.summary: Creates an Express Cloud Connect (ECC) instance.

CreateForwardEntry.title: CreateForwardEntry
CreateForwardEntry.summary: Adds a DNAT entry to a DNAT table.

CreateFullNatEntry.title: CreateFullNatEntry
CreateFullNatEntry.summary: Adds a FULLNAT entry to the FULLNAT table.

CreateHaVip.title: CreateHaVip
CreateHaVip.summary: Creates a high-availability virtual IP address (HAVIP).

CreateHighReliablePhysicalConnection.title: CreateHighReliablePhysicalConnection
CreateHighReliablePhysicalConnection.summary: Creates an Express Connect circuit in high availability mode. This improves the stability of multiple Express Connect circuits and prevents service interruptions caused by single points of failures.

CreateIPv6Translator.title: CreateIPv6Translator
CreateIPv6Translator.summary: Creates an IPv6 Translation Service instance.

CreateIPv6TranslatorEntry.title: CreateIPv6TranslatorEntry
CreateIPv6TranslatorEntry.summary: Adds an IPv6 mapping entry to an IPv6 Translation Service instance.

CreateIpv6EgressOnlyRule.title: CreateIpv6EgressOnlyRule
CreateIpv6EgressOnlyRule.summary: You can call CreateIpv6EgressOnlyRule to create egress-only rules to enable ECS instances in VPCs that have IPv6 enabled to access IPv6 clients. However, IPv6 clients cannot access the ECS instances over the Internet.

CreateIpv6Gateway.title: CreateIpv6Gateway
CreateIpv6Gateway.summary: IPv6 gateways are used to control the IPv6 traffic of virtual private clouds (VPCs). You can call the CreateIpv6Gateway operation to create IPv6 gateways.

CreateNatGateway.title: CreateNatGateway
CreateNatGateway.summary: Creates an enhanced Internet NAT gateway or a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) NAT gateway.

CreatePhysicalConnection.title: CreatePhysicalConnection
CreatePhysicalConnection.summary: Applies for an Express Connect circuit.

CreatePhysicalConnectionOccupancyOrder.title: CreatePhysicalConnectionOccupancyOrder
CreatePhysicalConnectionOccupancyOrder.summary: Creates an order for resource usage fees.

CreatePhysicalConnectionSetupOrder.title: CreatePhysicalConnectionSetupOrder
CreatePhysicalConnectionSetupOrder.summary: Creates an order for initial installation of an Express Connect circuit.

CreateRouteEntries.title: CreateRouteEntries
CreateRouteEntries.summary: Adds custom route entries to the route table of a vRouter in a virtual private cloud (VPC).

CreateRouteEntry.title: CreateRouteEntry
CreateRouteEntry.summary: Creates a custom route entry in the route table of a VRouter or virtual border router (VBR).

CreateSnatEntry.title: CreateSnatEntry
CreateSnatEntry.summary: Adds an SNAT entry to an SNAT table.

CreateTrafficMirrorFilter.title: CreateTrafficMirrorFilter
CreateTrafficMirrorFilter.summary: Creates a filter for traffic mirroring.

CreateTrafficMirrorFilterRules.title: CreateTrafficMirrorFilterRules
CreateTrafficMirrorFilterRules.summary: Creates an inbound or outbound rule for traffic mirroring.

CreateVSwitchCidrReservation.title: CreateVSwitchCidrReservation
CreateVSwitchCidrReservation.summary: Creates a reserved CIDR block for a vSwitch.

CreateVbrHa.title: CreateVbrHa
CreateVbrHa.summary: Creates a virtual border router (VBR) failover group.

CreateVcoRouteEntry.title: CreateVcoRouteEntry
CreateVcoRouteEntry.summary: Adds a destination-based route for an IPsec-VPN connection.

CreateVirtualPhysicalConnection.title: CreateVirtualPhysicalConnection
CreateVirtualPhysicalConnection.summary: Creates a hosted connection over Express Connect circuit.

CreateVpconnFromVbr.title: CreateVpconnFromVbr
CreateVpconnFromVbr.summary: Adds a shared port to a hosted connection.

CreateVpnAttachment.title: CreateVpnAttachment
CreateVpnAttachment.summary: Creates an IPsec-VPN connection. After you create the IPsec-VPN connection, you can associate the IPsec-VPN connection with a transit router.

CreateVpnPbrRouteEntry.title: CreateVpnPbrRouteEntry
CreateVpnPbrRouteEntry.summary: Creates a policy-based route for a VPN gateway.

CreateVpnRouteEntry.title: CreateVpnRouteEntry
CreateVpnRouteEntry.summary: Creates a destination-based route for a VPN gateway. After a destination-based route is created, the VPN gateway forwards traffic that matches the destination IP address specified in the destination-based route.

DeactiveFlowLog.title: DeactiveFlowLog
DeactiveFlowLog.summary: Disables a flow log. After a flow log is disabled, the system no longer captures the traffic information about a resource.

DeleteBgpGroup.title: DeleteBgpGroup
DeleteBgpGroup.summary: Deletes a Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) group.

DeleteBgpNetwork.title: DeleteBgpNetwork
DeleteBgpNetwork.summary: Deletes an advertised Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) network.

DeleteBgpPeer.title: DeleteBgpPeer
DeleteBgpPeer.summary: Deletes a Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) peer.

DeleteCommonBandwidthPackage.title: DeleteCommonBandwidthPackage
DeleteCommonBandwidthPackage.summary: Deletes an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

DeleteFailoverTestJob.title: DeleteFailoverTestJob
DeleteFailoverTestJob.summary: Deletes a failover test. You can delete only a failover test that is in the Pending or Complete state.

DeleteHaVip.title: DeleteHaVip
DeleteHaVip.summary: Deletes a high-availability virtual IP address (HAVIP).

DeleteIPv6Translator.title: DeleteIPv6Translator
DeleteIPv6Translator.summary: Deletes an IPv6 Translation Service instance.

DeleteIPv6TranslatorAclList.title: DeleteIPv6TranslatorAclList
DeleteIPv6TranslatorAclList.summary: Deletes an access control list (ACL). You can delete an ACL only when the ACL is not associated with IPv6 translation mappings.

DeleteNatGateway.title: DeleteNatGateway
DeleteNatGateway.summary: Deletes a specified Internet NAT gateway.

DeleteNetworkAcl.title: DeleteNetworkAcl
DeleteNetworkAcl.summary: Deletes a network access control list (ACL).

DeletePhysicalConnection.title: DeletePhysicalConnection
DeletePhysicalConnection.summary: Deletes a connection over an Express Connect circuit.

DeletePublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlock.title: DeletePublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlock
DeletePublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlock.summary: Deletes a CIDR block from an IP address pool.

DeleteRouteEntries.title: DeleteRouteEntries
DeleteRouteEntries.summary: Deletes multiple custom route entries at a time.

DeleteRouteEntry.title: DeleteRouteEntry
DeleteRouteEntry.summary: Deletes a route entry from a route table of a VRouter or virtual border router (VBR).

DeleteTrafficMirrorFilter.title: DeleteTrafficMirrorFilter
DeleteTrafficMirrorFilter.summary: Deletes a filter of traffic mirroring.

DeleteTrafficMirrorFilterRules.title: DeleteTrafficMirrorFilterRules
DeleteTrafficMirrorFilterRules.summary: Deletes an inbound or outbound rule of a filter for traffic mirroring.

DeleteVSwitchCidrReservation.title: DeleteVSwitchCidrReservation
DeleteVSwitchCidrReservation.summary: Deletes a reserved CIDR block of a vSwitch.

DeleteVbrHa.title: DeleteVbrHa
DeleteVbrHa.summary: Deletes a virtual border router (VBR) failover group.

DeleteVcoRouteEntry.title: DeleteVcoRouteEntry
DeleteVcoRouteEntry.summary: Deletes a destination-based route from an IPsec-VPN connection.

DeleteVpnPbrRouteEntry.title: DeleteVpnPbrRouteEntry
DeleteVpnPbrRouteEntry.summary: Deletes a policy-based route from a VPN gateway.

DeleteVpnRouteEntry.title: DeleteVpnRouteEntry
DeleteVpnRouteEntry.summary: Deletes a destination-based route from a VPN gateway.

DeletionProtection.title: DeletionProtection
DeletionProtection.summary: Configures deletion protection for an instance.

DescribeAccessPoints.title: DescribeAccessPoints
DescribeAccessPoints.summary: Queries the access points of Express Connect circuits in a region.

DescribeBgpGroups.title: DescribeBgpGroups
DescribeBgpGroups.summary: Queries Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) groups in a region.

DescribeBgpNetworks.title: DescribeBgpNetworks
DescribeBgpNetworks.summary: Queries advertised Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) networks.

DescribeBgpPeers.title: DescribeBgpPeers
DescribeBgpPeers.summary: Queries Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) peers in a region.

DescribeCommonBandwidthPackages.title: DescribeCommonBandwidthPackages
DescribeCommonBandwidthPackages.summary: Queries Internet Shared Bandwidth instances in a region.

DescribeCustomerGateway.title: DescribeCustomerGateway
DescribeCustomerGateway.summary: Queries details of a customer gateway.

DescribeEcGrantRelation.title: DescribeEcGrantRelation
DescribeEcGrantRelation.summary: Queries whether permissions on a virtual private cloud (VPC) are granted to a virtual border router (VBR).

DescribeEipAddresses.title: DescribeEipAddresses
DescribeEipAddresses.summary: Queries elastic IP addresses (EIPs) in a region.

DescribeEipGatewayInfo.title: DescribeEipGatewayInfo
DescribeEipGatewayInfo.summary: Queries the gateway and subnet mask of an elastic IP address (EIP).

DescribeEipMonitorData.title: DescribeEipMonitorData
DescribeEipMonitorData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of an elastic IP address (EIP). You can query monitoring data within the last 30 days, and obtain up to 400 data points in each request.

DescribeEipSegment.title: DescribeEipSegment
DescribeEipSegment.summary: Queries contiguous elastic IP address (EIP) groups.

DescribeFailoverTestJob.title: DescribeFailoverTestJob
DescribeFailoverTestJob.summary: Queries the details of a failover test.

DescribeFailoverTestJobs.title: DescribeFailoverTestJobs
DescribeFailoverTestJobs.summary: Queries failover tests for Express Connect circuits. You can specify paging parameters and filter conditions.

DescribeFlowLogs.title: DescribeFlowLogs
DescribeFlowLogs.summary: Queries the information about flow logs.

DescribeGrantRulesToCen.title: DescribeGrantRulesToCen
DescribeGrantRulesToCen.summary: Queries the permissions granted to attach a network instance to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance that belongs to another Alibaba Cloud account. The network instance can be a virtual private cloud (VPC), a virtual border router (VBR), or a Cloud Connect Network (CCN) instance.

DescribeHighDefinitionMonitorLogAttribut.title: DescribeHighDefinitionMonitorLogAttribute
DescribeHighDefinitionMonitorLogAttribut.summary: Queries configurations about the fine-grained monitoring feature of an elastic IP address (EIP).

DescribeIPv6TranslatorAclListAttributes.title: DescribeIPv6TranslatorAclListAttributes
DescribeIPv6TranslatorAclListAttributes.summary: Queries the details of an access control list (ACL), including the specified IP addresses and associated IPv6 mapping entries.

DescribeIpv6Addresses.title: DescribeIpv6Addresses
DescribeIpv6Addresses.summary: Queries IPv6 addresses in a region.

DescribeIpv6GatewayAttribute.title: DescribeIpv6GatewayAttribute
DescribeIpv6GatewayAttribute.summary: Queries the information about an IPv6 gateway, including the region, virtual private cloud (VPC), status, and billing method.

DescribeIpv6Gateways.title: DescribeIpv6Gateways
DescribeIpv6Gateways.summary: Queries IPv6 gateways in a region.

DescribeNatGateways.title: DescribeNatGateways
DescribeNatGateways.summary: Queries NAT gateways that meet specific conditions in a specified region.

DescribePhysicalConnectionLOA.title: DescribePhysicalConnectionLOA
DescribePhysicalConnectionLOA.summary: Queries the LOA information about an Express Connect circuit.

DescribePhysicalConnections.title: DescribePhysicalConnections
DescribePhysicalConnections.summary: Queries Express Connect circuits in a region.

DescribePublicIpAddress.title: DescribePublicIpAddress
DescribePublicIpAddress.summary: Queries the public IP address range of a virtual private cloud (VPC) in a region.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the most recent region list.

DescribeRouteEntryList.title: DescribeRouteEntryList
DescribeRouteEntryList.summary: Queries information about route entries in a route table.

DescribeRouterInterfaceAttribute.title: DescribeRouterInterfaceAttribute
DescribeRouterInterfaceAttribute.summary: Queries the configuration of a router interface.

DescribeRouterInterfaces.title: DescribeRouterInterfaces
DescribeRouterInterfaces.summary: Queries router interfaces in a specified region.

DescribeServerRelatedGlobalAccelerationI.title: DescribeServerRelatedGlobalAccelerationInstances
DescribeServerRelatedGlobalAccelerationI.summary: Queries the GA instances that are associated with a specified backend server.

DescribeSslVpnClientCert.title: DescribeSslVpnClientCert
DescribeSslVpnClientCert.summary: Queries the details of an SSL client certificate.

DescribeSslVpnClients.title: DescribeSslVpnClients
DescribeSslVpnClients.summary: Queries the clients that have connected to a VPN gateway through SSL-VPN connections.

DescribeSslVpnServers.title: DescribeSslVpnServers
DescribeSslVpnServers.summary: Queries one or more SSL-VPN servers.

DescribeTagKeysForExpressConnect.title: DescribeTagKeysForExpressConnect
DescribeTagKeysForExpressConnect.summary: Queries the tags of an Express Connect circuit.

DescribeTags.title: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.summary: Queries tags that meet the specified filter conditions.

DescribeVSwitchAttributes.title: DescribeVSwitchAttributes
DescribeVSwitchAttributes.summary: Queries the detailed information about a vSwitch.

DescribeVSwitches.title: DescribeVSwitches
DescribeVSwitches.summary: Queries the information about available vSwitches that are used for an internal network.

DescribeVbrHa.title: DescribeVbrHa
DescribeVbrHa.summary: Queries virtual border router (VBR) failover groups.

DescribeVcoRouteEntries.title: DescribeVcoRouteEntries
DescribeVcoRouteEntries.summary: Queries the routes of an IPsec-VPN connection.

DescribeVirtualBorderRoutersForPhysicalC.title: DescribeVirtualBorderRoutersForPhysicalConnection
DescribeVirtualBorderRoutersForPhysicalC.summary: Queries the virtual border routers (VBRs) that are associated with an Express Connect circuit. The VBRs can be created by the owner of the Express Connect circuit and by other Alibaba Cloud accounts.

DescribeVpcAttribute.title: DescribeVpcAttribute
DescribeVpcAttribute.summary: Queries the configuration of a virtual private cloud (VPC).

DescribeVpnAttachments.title: DescribeVpnAttachments
DescribeVpnAttachments.summary: Queries the IPsec-VPN connections associated with a transit router.

DescribeVpnConnection.title: DescribeVpnConnection
DescribeVpnConnection.summary: Queries the detailed information about an IPsec-VPN connection.

DescribeVpnCrossAccountAuthorizations.title: DescribeVpnCrossAccountAuthorizations
DescribeVpnCrossAccountAuthorizations.summary: Queries the cross-account authorization information about an IPsec-VPN connection.

DescribeVpnGateway.title: DescribeVpnGateway
DescribeVpnGateway.summary: Queries the detailed information about a VPN gateway.

DescribeVpnGatewayAvailableZones.title: DescribeVpnGatewayAvailableZones
DescribeVpnGatewayAvailableZones.summary: Queries zones that support IPsec-VPN connections in a region.

DescribeVpnGateways.title: DescribeVpnGateways
DescribeVpnGateways.summary: Queries VPN gateways in a region.

DescribeVpnPbrRouteEntries.title: DescribeVpnPbrRouteEntries
DescribeVpnPbrRouteEntries.summary: Queries policy-based routes configured for a VPN gateway.

DescribeVpnRouteEntries.title: DescribeVpnRouteEntries
DescribeVpnRouteEntries.summary: Queries destination-based and BGP route entries of a VPN gateway.

DescribeVpnSslServerLogs.title: DescribeVpnSslServerLogs
DescribeVpnSslServerLogs.summary: Queries the log entries of an SSL server.

DetachDhcpOptionsSetFromVpc.title: DetachDhcpOptionsSetFromVpc
DetachDhcpOptionsSetFromVpc.summary: Disassociates a DHCP options set from a virtual private cloud (VPC).

DisableNatGatewayEcsMetric.title: DisableNatGatewayEcsMetric
DisableNatGatewayEcsMetric.summary: Disables traffic monitoring for an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

DisableVpcClassicLink.title: DisableVpcClassicLink
DisableVpcClassicLink.summary: Disables ClassicLink for a virtual private cloud (VPC).

DissociateRouteTableFromGateway.title: DissociateRouteTableFromGateway
DissociateRouteTableFromGateway.summary: Disassociates a gateway route table from an IPv4 gateway.

DissociateRouteTablesFromVpcGatewayEndpo.title: DissociateRouteTablesFromVpcGatewayEndpoint
DissociateRouteTablesFromVpcGatewayEndpo.summary: Disassociates a gateway endpoint from a route table.

DissociateVpnGatewayWithCertificate.title: DissociateVpnGatewayWithCertificate
DissociateVpnGatewayWithCertificate.summary: Disassociates a certificate from a VPN gateway.

DownloadVpnConnectionConfig.title: DownloadVpnConnectionConfig
DownloadVpnConnectionConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of an IPsec-VPN connection.

EnableNatGatewayEcsMetric.title: EnableNatGatewayEcsMetric
EnableNatGatewayEcsMetric.summary: Enables Elastic Compute Service (ECS) traffic monitoring.

EnablePhysicalConnection.title: EnablePhysicalConnection
EnablePhysicalConnection.summary: Enables an Express Connect circuit that is in the Confirmed state. After you perform this operation, the Express Connect circuit enters the Enabled state.

GetFlowLogServiceStatus.title: GetFlowLogServiceStatus
GetFlowLogServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of a flow log.

GetNatGatewayAttribute.title: GetNatGatewayAttribute
GetNatGatewayAttribute.summary: Queries information about a NAT gateway.

GetPhysicalConnectionServiceStatus.title: GetPhysicalConnectionServiceStatus
GetPhysicalConnectionServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of outbound data transfer billing for the current account.

GetTrafficMirrorServiceStatus.title: GetTrafficMirrorServiceStatus
GetTrafficMirrorServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of the traffic mirroring feature.

GetVSwitchCidrReservationUsage.title: GetVSwitchCidrReservationUsage
GetVSwitchCidrReservationUsage.summary: Queries the usage of a prefix list.

GetVpcGatewayEndpointAttribute.title: GetVpcGatewayEndpointAttribute
GetVpcGatewayEndpointAttribute.summary: Queries the attributes of a gateway endpoint.

GetVpcPrefixListAssociations.title: GetVpcPrefixListAssociations
GetVpcPrefixListAssociations.summary: Queries the resources that are associated with a prefix list.

GetVpcPrefixListEntries.title: GetVpcPrefixListEntries
GetVpcPrefixListEntries.summary: Queries the information about a prefix list.

GetVpnGatewayDiagnoseResult.title: GetVpnGatewayDiagnoseResult
GetVpnGatewayDiagnoseResult.summary: Queries the diagnostic result of a VPN gateway.

GrantInstanceToCen.title: GrantInstanceToCen
GrantInstanceToCen.summary: Grants permissions to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

GrantInstanceToVbr.title: GrantInstanceToVbr
GrantInstanceToVbr.summary: Grants a virtual border router (VBR) the permissions to connect to a virtual private cloud (VPC) that belongs to another Alibaba Cloud account.

ListBusinessAccessPoints.title: ListBusinessAccessPoints
ListBusinessAccessPoints.summary: Queries the access points of an Express Connect circuit.

ListDhcpOptionsSets.title: ListDhcpOptionsSets
ListDhcpOptionsSets.summary: Queries Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) options sets.

ListEnhanhcedNatGatewayAvailableZones.title: ListEnhanhcedNatGatewayAvailableZones
ListEnhanhcedNatGatewayAvailableZones.summary: Queries the zones that support NAT gateways.

ListGatewayRouteTableEntries.title: ListGatewayRouteTableEntries
ListGatewayRouteTableEntries.summary: Queries route entries of a gateway route table.

ListGeographicSubRegions.title: ListGeographicSubRegions
ListGeographicSubRegions.summary: Queries the most recent region list.

ListIpsecServerLogs.title: ListIpsecServerLogs
ListIpsecServerLogs.summary: Queries the logs of an IPsec server.

ListNatIpCidrs.title: ListNatIpCidrs
ListNatIpCidrs.summary: Queries the CIDR blocks of a specified NAT gateway.

ListNatIps.title: ListNatIps
ListNatIps.summary: Queries the IP addresses on a NAT gateway.

ListPublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlocks.title: ListPublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlocks
ListPublicIpAddressPoolCidrBlocks.summary: Queries CIDR blocks in an IP address pool.

ListPublicIpAddressPools.title: ListPublicIpAddressPools
ListPublicIpAddressPools.summary: Queries the information about the available IP address pools.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources.

ListTagResourcesForExpressConnect.title: ListTagResourcesForExpressConnect
ListTagResourcesForExpressConnect.summary: Queries the tags that are added to an Express Connect circuit.

ListTrafficMirrorSessions.title: ListTrafficMirrorSessions
ListTrafficMirrorSessions.summary: Queries the details of a traffic mirror session.

ListVpnCertificateAssociations.title: ListVpnCertificateAssociations
ListVpnCertificateAssociations.summary: Queries the association between VPN gateways and certificates in a region.

ModifyBgpGroupAttribute.title: ModifyBgpGroupAttribute
ModifyBgpGroupAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) group.

ModifyBgpPeerAttribute.title: ModifyBgpPeerAttribute
ModifyBgpPeerAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a BGP peer.

ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageAttribute.title: ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageAttribute
ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageIpBandwidth.title: ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageIpBandwidth
ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageIpBandwidth.summary: Sets the maximum bandwidth of an elastic IP address (EIP) that is associated with an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageSpec.title: ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageSpec
ModifyCommonBandwidthPackageSpec.summary: Modifies the maximum bandwidth of an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

ModifyCustomerGatewayAttribute.title: ModifyCustomerGatewayAttribute
ModifyCustomerGatewayAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a customer gateway.

ModifyEipAddressAttribute.title: ModifyEipAddressAttribute
ModifyEipAddressAttribute.summary: Modifies the name, description, and maximum bandwidth of an elastic IP address (EIP).

ModifyExpressCloudConnectionAttribute.title: ModifyExpressCloudConnectionAttribute
ModifyExpressCloudConnectionAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of an Express Cloud Connect (ECC) instance.

ModifyExpressCloudConnectionBandwidth.title: ModifyExpressCloudConnectionBandwidth
ModifyExpressCloudConnectionBandwidth.summary: Modifies the bandwidth of an Express Cloud Connect (ECC) instance.

ModifyFlowLogAttribute.title: ModifyFlowLogAttribute
ModifyFlowLogAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a flow log.

ModifyGlobalAccelerationInstanceAttribut.title: ModifyGlobalAccelerationInstanceAttributes
ModifyGlobalAccelerationInstanceAttribut.summary: Modifies the name and description of a Global Accelerator (GA) instance.

ModifyGlobalAccelerationInstanceSpec.title: ModifyGlobalAccelerationInstanceSpec
ModifyGlobalAccelerationInstanceSpec.summary: Modifies the maximum bandwidth of a Global Accelerator (GA) instance.

ModifyHaVipAttribute.title: ModifyHaVipAttribute
ModifyHaVipAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of an HAVIP.

ModifyIPv6TranslatorAclAttribute.title: ModifyIPv6TranslatorAclAttribute
ModifyIPv6TranslatorAclAttribute.summary: Modifies the name of an access control list (ACL).

ModifyIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry.title: ModifyIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry
ModifyIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry.summary: Modifies an IP entry in an access control list (ACL).

ModifyIPv6TranslatorAttribute.title: ModifyIPv6TranslatorAttribute
ModifyIPv6TranslatorAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of an IPv6 Translation Service instance.

ModifyIPv6TranslatorBandwidth.title: ModifyIPv6TranslatorBandwidth
ModifyIPv6TranslatorBandwidth.summary: Modifies the maximum bandwidth of an IPv6 Translation Service instance.

ModifyIpv6AddressAttribute.title: ModifyIpv6AddressAttribute

ModifyIpv6GatewayAttribute.title: ModifyIpv6GatewayAttribute
ModifyIpv6GatewayAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of an IPv6 gateway.

ModifyIpv6InternetBandwidth.title: ModifyIpv6InternetBandwidth
ModifyIpv6InternetBandwidth.summary: Modifies the Internet bandwidth value of an IPv6 address.

ModifyNatGatewayAttribute.title: ModifyNatGatewayAttribute
ModifyNatGatewayAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a NAT gateway.

ModifyNatGatewaySpec.title: ModifyNatGatewaySpec

ModifyNatIpAttribute.title: ModifyNatIpAttribute
ModifyNatIpAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a NAT IP address.

ModifyNatIpCidrAttribute.title: ModifyNatIpCidrAttribute
ModifyNatIpCidrAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a NAT CIDR block.

ModifyNetworkAclAttributes.title: ModifyNetworkAclAttributes
ModifyNetworkAclAttributes.summary: Modifies the attributes of a network access control list (ACL).

ModifyPhysicalConnectionAttribute.title: ModifyPhysicalConnectionAttribute
ModifyPhysicalConnectionAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of an Express Connect circuit.

ModifyRouteEntry.title: ModifyRouteEntry
ModifyRouteEntry.summary: Modifies the name and description of a custom route entry.

ModifyRouteTableAttributes.title: ModifyRouteTableAttributes
ModifyRouteTableAttributes.summary: Modifies the name and description of a route table.

ModifyRouterInterfaceAttribute.title: ModifyRouterInterfaceAttribute
ModifyRouterInterfaceAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a router interface.

ModifyRouterInterfaceSpec.title: ModifyRouterInterfaceSpec
ModifyRouterInterfaceSpec.summary: Modifies the specification of a router interface.

ModifySslVpnClientCert.title: ModifySslVpnClientCert
ModifySslVpnClientCert.summary: Modifies the name of an SSL-VPN client certificate.

ModifySslVpnServer.title: ModifySslVpnServer
ModifySslVpnServer.summary: Modifies the configurations of an SSL server.

ModifyVRouterAttribute.title: ModifyVRouterAttribute
ModifyVRouterAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a vRouter.

ModifyVSwitchAttribute.title: ModifyVSwitchAttribute
ModifyVSwitchAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a vSwitch.

ModifyVcoRouteEntryWeight.title: ModifyVcoRouteEntryWeight
ModifyVcoRouteEntryWeight.summary: Modifies the weight of a destination-based route for an IPsec-VPN connection.

ModifyVirtualBorderRouterAttribute.title: ModifyVirtualBorderRouterAttribute
ModifyVirtualBorderRouterAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a virtual border router (VBR).

ModifyVpcAttribute.title: ModifyVpcAttribute
ModifyVpcAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a virtual private cloud (VPC).

ModifyVpcPrefixList.title: ModifyVpcPrefixList
ModifyVpcPrefixList.summary: Modifies the configuration of a prefix list.

ModifyVpnAttachmentAttribute.title: ModifyVpnAttachmentAttribute
ModifyVpnAttachmentAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of an IPsec-VPN connection.

ModifyVpnConnectionAttribute.title: ModifyVpnConnectionAttribute
ModifyVpnConnectionAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of an IPsec-VPN connection.

ModifyVpnGatewayAttribute.title: ModifyVpnGatewayAttribute
ModifyVpnGatewayAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a VPN gateway.

ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryAttribute.title: ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryAttribute
ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryAttribute.summary: Modifies the weight and priority of a policy-based route.

ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryPriority.title: ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryPriority
ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryPriority.summary: Modifies the priority of a policy-based route.

ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryWeight.title: ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryWeight
ModifyVpnPbrRouteEntryWeight.summary: Modifies the weight of a policy-based route of a VPN gateway.

ModifyVpnRouteEntryWeight.title: ModifyVpnRouteEntryWeight
ModifyVpnRouteEntryWeight.summary: Modifies the weight of a destination-based route.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource to a different resource group.

MoveVpnResourceGroup.title: MoveVpnResourceGroup
MoveVpnResourceGroup.summary: Moves a VPN gateway resource to a new resource group.

OpenPhysicalConnectionService.title: OpenPhysicalConnectionService
OpenPhysicalConnectionService.summary: Enables billing for outbound data transfer.

PublishVpnRouteEntry.title: PublishVpnRouteEntry
PublishVpnRouteEntry.summary: Advertises/withdraws a destination-based route or a policy-based route to/from the system route table of a virtual private cloud (VPC).

RecoverVirtualBorderRouter.title: RecoverVirtualBorderRouter
RecoverVirtualBorderRouter.summary: Enables a disabled virtual border router (VBR).

RemoveCommonBandwidthPackageIp.title: RemoveCommonBandwidthPackageIp
RemoveCommonBandwidthPackageIp.summary: Disassociates an EIP from an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance.

RemoveIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry.title: RemoveIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry
RemoveIPv6TranslatorAclListEntry.summary: Deletes an IP entry from an ACL.

RemoveSourcesFromTrafficMirrorSession.title: RemoveSourcesFromTrafficMirrorSession
RemoveSourcesFromTrafficMirrorSession.summary: Deletes a traffic mirror source from a traffic mirror session.

ReplaceVpcDhcpOptionsSet.title: ReplaceVpcDhcpOptionsSet
ReplaceVpcDhcpOptionsSet.summary: Replaces the DHCP options set that is associated with a virtual private cloud (VPC).

RevokeInstanceFromCen.title: RevokeInstanceFromCen
RevokeInstanceFromCen.summary: Revokes the permissions granted to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance on a network instance.

RevokeInstanceFromVbr.title: RevokeInstanceFromVbr
RevokeInstanceFromVbr.summary: Revokes the permissions granted to a virtual border router (VBR) on a virtual private cloud (VPC).

SecondApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA.title: SecondApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA
SecondApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA.summary: If your application for a Letter of Authorization (LOA) by calling the ApplyPhysicalConnectionLOA operation is denied, you can call this operation to apply again.

SetHighDefinitionMonitorLogStatus.title: SetHighDefinitionMonitorLogStatus
SetHighDefinitionMonitorLogStatus.summary: Configures fine-grained monitoring for an elastic IP address (EIP).

StartFailoverTestJob.title: StartFailoverTestJob
StartFailoverTestJob.summary: Starts a failover test. You can start only a failover test that is in the Init state.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to resources.

TagResourcesForExpressConnect.title: TagResourcesForExpressConnect
TagResourcesForExpressConnect.summary: Creates tags and adds the tags to an Express Connect circuit.

TerminatePhysicalConnection.title: TerminatePhysicalConnection
TerminatePhysicalConnection.summary: Disables an Express Connect circuit after it is enabled.

UnassociateEipAddress.title: UnassociateEipAddress
UnassociateEipAddress.summary: Disassociates an elastic IP address (EIP) from a cloud resource.

UnassociateGlobalAccelerationInstance.title: UnassociateGlobalAccelerationInstance
UnassociateGlobalAccelerationInstance.summary: Disassociates a Global Accelerator (GA) instance from a backend server.

UnassociateHaVip.title: UnassociateHaVip
UnassociateHaVip.summary: Disassociates a high-availability virtual IP address (HAVIP) from an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or an elastic network interface (ENI) in a virtual private cloud (VPC).

UnassociateNetworkAcl.title: UnassociateNetworkAcl
UnassociateNetworkAcl.summary: Disassociates a network access control list (ACL) from a vSwitch.

UnassociatePhysicalConnectionFromVirtual.title: UnassociatePhysicalConnectionFromVirtualBorderRouter
UnassociatePhysicalConnectionFromVirtual.summary: Disassociates a virtual border router (VBR) from an Express Connect circuit.

UnassociateRouteTable.title: UnassociateRouteTable
UnassociateRouteTable.summary: Disassociates a route table from a vSwitch.

UnassociateVpcCidrBlock.title: UnassociateVpcCidrBlock
UnassociateVpcCidrBlock.summary: Removes a secondary CIDR block from a virtual private cloud (VPC).

UntagResourcesForExpressConnect.title: UntagResourcesForExpressConnect
UntagResourcesForExpressConnect.summary: Removes tags from an Express Connect circuit at a time.

UpdateDhcpOptionsSetAttribute.title: UpdateDhcpOptionsSetAttribute
UpdateDhcpOptionsSetAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a DHCP options set.

UpdateFailoverTestJob.title: UpdateFailoverTestJob
UpdateFailoverTestJob.summary: Updates a failover test. You can update only a failover test that is in the Init state.

UpdateGatewayRouteTableEntryAttribute.title: UpdateGatewayRouteTableEntryAttribute
UpdateGatewayRouteTableEntryAttribute.summary: Modifies the next hop type and next hop of the route entry in a gateway route table.

UpdateIpsecServer.title: UpdateIpsecServer
UpdateIpsecServer.summary: Modifies the configuration of an IPsec server.

UpdateIpv4GatewayAttribute.title: UpdateIpv4GatewayAttribute
UpdateIpv4GatewayAttribute.summary: Modifies the description or name of an IPv4 gateway.

UpdateNatGatewayNatType.title: UpdateNatGatewayNatType
UpdateNatGatewayNatType.summary: Upgrades a standard NAT gateway to an enhanced NAT gateway.

UpdateNetworkAclEntries.title: UpdateNetworkAclEntries
UpdateNetworkAclEntries.summary: Updates the rules of a network access control list (ACL).

UpdatePublicIpAddressPoolAttribute.title: UpdatePublicIpAddressPoolAttribute
UpdatePublicIpAddressPoolAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes of an IP address pool.

UpdateTrafficMirrorFilterAttribute.title: UpdateTrafficMirrorFilterAttribute
UpdateTrafficMirrorFilterAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a filter for traffic mirroring.

UpdateTrafficMirrorFilterRuleAttribute.title: UpdateTrafficMirrorFilterRuleAttribute
UpdateTrafficMirrorFilterRuleAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of an inbound or outbound rule for traffic mirroring.

UpdateTrafficMirrorSessionAttribute.title: UpdateTrafficMirrorSessionAttribute
UpdateTrafficMirrorSessionAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a traffic mirror session.

UpdateVirtualBorderBandwidth.title: UpdateVirtualBorderBandwidth
UpdateVirtualBorderBandwidth.summary: Updates the maximum bandwidth value of outbound data transfer for a virtual border router (VBR).

UpdateVirtualPhysicalConnection.title: UpdateVirtualPhysicalConnection
UpdateVirtualPhysicalConnection.summary: Changes the virtual local area network (VLAN) ID of a hosted connection over Express Connect circuit.

UpdateVpcGatewayEndpointAttribute.title: UpdateVpcGatewayEndpointAttribute
UpdateVpcGatewayEndpointAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a gateway endpoint.

VpcDescribeVpcNatGatewayNetworkInterface.title: VpcDescribeVpcNatGatewayNetworkInterfaceQuota
VpcDescribeVpcNatGatewayNetworkInterface.summary: Queries the quota of endpoints that can be created in the reversely accessed VPC NAT gateway.
